title: How to Have Fun With Memes in Scribblenauts

steps.headline: Use your stylus to tap on the notepad.
Write any of the following memes:
steps.description:
All Your Base Are Belong To Us Anonymous Believe or GAF or NeoGAF or The GAF (all the same) Bully Ceiling Cat Do not want FTW (gives you a starlite) Giant Enemy Crab I See What You Did There Invisible Bike Keyboard Cat Large Hadron Collider Leeroy Jenkins (will resemble a knight) Loituma Girl lol wut Rollerskates Long cat Man-bear-pig. Monorail Cat
Ninja Shark
O RLY or YA RLY
Om Nom Nom Nom
Philosoraptor
Post 217
Rickroll
Roflcopter
Spaghetti Cat
Tacgnol
Weegee

steps.headline: Have fun!
steps.description: Use your imagination, which is the whole point of the game. Create your own roleplaying game by using any word in the in-game dictionary and memes - be sure that none of them explode before you get to use them.

text:
Use your stylus to tap on the notepad.  Write any of the following memes: All Your Base Are Belong To Us Anonymous Believe or GAF or NeoGAF or The GAF (all the same) Bully Ceiling Cat Do not want FTW (gives you a starlite) Giant Enemy Crab I See What You Did There Invisible Bike Keyboard Cat Large Hadron Collider Leeroy Jenkins (will resemble a knight) Loituma Girl lol wut Rollerskates Long cat Man-bear-pig. Monorail Cat
Ninja Shark
O RLY or YA RLY
Om Nom Nom Nom
Philosoraptor
Post 217
Rickroll
Roflcopter
Spaghetti Cat
Tacgnol
Weegee Have fun! Use your imagination, which is the whole point of the game. Create your own roleplaying game by using any word in the in-game dictionary and memes - be sure that none of them explode before you get to use them.
